name: Dimensional Seesaw
description:
Dimensional Seesaw is a first-person shooter with level design similar to 90s shooters. Switch between different dimensions while fighting horrific and challenging enemies.

The objective is simple: You are trying to escape this world that you have been thrown into, A world where you can switch dimensions at will to gain the advantage over your enemies.  Destroy everything in your way in order to make it to the end.   Whether you are escaping a Sci/Fi themed apartment complex or a gritty dungeon, you must push on.  Can you escape this nightmare?

Features: 

-  Destructive weapons to shred your enemies

-  Exciting boss fights that will test your skill and reaction time

-  Pickups/Powerups to give you the edge in combat

-  An assortment of different enemies, each wanting to tear you apart
